mapper.select: SELECT TRIM(DocClassID) AS "no" , ClassName AS "nodeName" , DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jwf_docclass B WHERE B.ParentDocClassID = A.DocClassID AND B.EntCode = A.EntCode ), 0,'6','0') AS "type" , ParentDocClassID AS "pno" , KeepYear , ParentDocClassID || ' ' || SortKey AS "SortKey" --, ParentDocClassID || ' ', DocClassID || ' ' || SortKey AS "SortKey" -- ,'#' AS url , 'N' AS "chk" , DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jwf_docclass B WHERE B.ParentDocClassID = A.DocClassID AND B.EntCode = A.EntCode ), 0,'Y','N') AS "rdo" FROM jwf_docclass A WHERE EntCode = #{EntCode} ORDER BY ParentDocClassID || ' ' || SortKey

SELECT TRIM(DocClassID) AS "no" , ClassName AS "nodeName" , DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jwf_docclass B WHERE B.ParentDocClassID = A.DocClassID AND B.EntCode = A.EntCode ), 0,'6','0') AS "type" , ParentDocClassID AS "pno" , KeepYear , ParentDocClassID || ' ' || SortKey AS "SortKey" --, ParentDocClassID || ' ', DocClassID || ' ' || SortKey AS "SortKey" -- ,'#' AS url , 'N' AS "chk" , DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jwf_docclass B WHERE B.ParentDocClassID = A.DocClassID AND B.EntCode = A.EntCode ), 0,'Y','N') AS "rdo" FROM jwf_docclass A
EntCode = #{EntCode}
EntCode IN (#{EntCode}, 'ORGROOT')
ORDER BY ParentDocClassID || ' ' || SortKey

SELECT TRIM(DocClassID) AS "no" , ClassName AS "nodeName" , DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jwf_docclass B WHERE B.ParentDocClassID = A.DocClassID AND B.EntCode = A.EntCode ), 0,'6','0') AS "type" , ParentDocClassID AS "pno" , KeepYear AS "KeepYear" , SortKey AS "SortKey" , '#' AS "url" , 'N' AS "chk" , 'N' AS "rdo" FROM jwf_docclass A WHERE EntCode = #{EntCode} AND DocClassID = #{DocClassID}
SELECT DomainCode AS "optionValue" , Displayname as "optionText " FROM sys_object_domain WHERE DeleteDate IS NULL AND IsUse = 'Y'
